sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"使人娱乐，消遣"之意。
means: amuse ：指使人通过注意某些有趣或悦人的事物而消遣，着重使人愉快的效果。
entertain ：指通过给他人快乐感的消遣活动，使自己或他人从单调中解脱出来。
interest ：普通用词，指出于任何原因使人兴奋或对某事物保持好奇心或注意力，侧重引起兴趣或注意。
please ：多指愿望、兴趣得到满足后产生的强烈满意情绪。

sentence.Network_en: "Please understand this," she began, a tremble in her voice.
sentence.Network_cn: “请理解这一点，”她开始说道，声音有些发颤。

sentence.Network_en: I'd like to check the balance in my account please.
sentence.Network_cn: 请查一下我的账户余额。

sentence.Network_en: I know this is an imposition. But please hear me out.
sentence.Network_cn: 我知道这是强人所难。但是请听我说完。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英文商务邮件开场白&amp;结尾 ... on the other hand 另一方面 please 请 read the manual 阅读手册吧.
美剧经典语录_bluewings_新浪博客 ... 68.Just trust me (请相信我) 69.Please (拜托，求你了) 70.I love you more (我更爱你).
词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Pleasing 愉快的 Please 取悦 Careless 粗心的.
yes , sir , just a moment , please ., 可以 , 先生 , 请您稍等.

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to emphasize the manner in which someone does something, especially when this is seen as surprising
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)[用于强调某人做事的方式，尤指被认为是令人诧异的方式]非常

lj.lj_ly: she walked forward as calm as you please.
lj.lj_ls: 她非常冷静地朝前走去。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to express indignation at something perceived as unreasonable
jx.jx_cn_mean: [用于表达对认为不合理事情的愤怒]竟然

lj.lj_ly: she wants me to make fifty cakes in time for the festival, if you please!.
lj.lj_ls: 她竟然让我为这个节日赶做50个蛋糕。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to express indifference, especially when someone does not cooperate or behave as expected
jx.jx_cn_mean: [用于表示漠然，尤指当某人不按预计情况合作或行动时]随你便吧

lj.lj_ly: ‘I can manage on my own.’ ‘Please yourself.’.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French plaisir 'to please', from Latin placere

entry.tran: （表示有礼貌地请求或邀请）请，烦劳
entry.def: You say please when you are politely asking or inviting someone to do something.

example.ex: Would you please open the door?...

entry.def: You say please when you are accepting something politely.

example.ex: 'You want an apple with your cheese?' — 'Please.'
example.tran: “要不要加个苹果和奶酪一起吃？”——“行啊。”

entry.tran: （表示要求对方停止做某事或别再开口）请别，请不必
entry.def: You can say please to indicate that you want someone to stop doing something or stop speaking. You would say this if, for example, what they are doing or saying makes you angry or upset.

example.ex: Please, Mary, this is all so unnecessary...
example.tran: 玛丽，请不要这样，这完全没必要。

example.ex: Isabella. Please. I don't have time for this.
example.tran: 伊莎贝拉，别再说了，我没有时间听这个。

entry.tran: （用于吸引对方注意、特别是儿童对老师或其他成人时）请问，对不起
entry.def: You can say please in order to attract someone's attention politely. Children in particular say 'please ' to attract the attention of a teacher or other adult.

example.ex: Please sir, can we have some more?...
example.tran: 请问，先生，我们能再要一些吗？
对不起，史密斯小姐，能耽误你一会儿吗？

entry.def: If someone or something pleases you, they make you feel happy and satisfied.

example.ex: More than anything, I want to please you...
example.tran: 最重要的是，我想让你高兴。

example.ex: Much of the food pleases rather than excites...
example.tran: 这些食物中许多只是让人满意，但并不让人兴奋。

entry.def: You use please in expressions such as as she pleases ,whatever you please, and anything he pleases to indicate that someone can do or have whatever they want.

example.ex: Women should be free to dress and act as they please...
example.tran: 女性应该有穿衣和行动的自由。

entry.tran: （用于强调）极尽…，…的程度怎么说都不为过
entry.def: You can use as you please in expressions such as bold as you please or casually as you please or charming as you please in order to emphasize what you are saying.

example.ex: He walked by my table and, casually as you please, picked up my address book...
example.tran: 他走到我的桌旁，非常随意地拿起了我的通讯录。

example.ex: Bold as you please, she grabbed me by the sleeve.
example.tran: 她真够大胆的，竟抓住了我的衣袖。

entry.tran: （表示很有礼貌和正式地吸引对方注意或提出请求）对不起，烦请
entry.def: If you please is sometimes used as a very polite and formal way of attracting someone's attention or of asking them to do something.

example.ex: Ladies and gentlemen, if you please. Miss Taylor's going to play for us...
example.tran: 女士们，先生们，烦请泰勒小姐为我们表演。

example.ex: Sir Harry! Stop, if you please!
example.tran: 哈里爵士！对不起，请等一下！

entry.tran: （表示惊讶、恼怒或难以置信）竟然，你说怪不怪
entry.def: You can say if you please to indicate that a situation surprises or annoys you, or is difficult to believe.

example.ex: She was pretty unforthcoming. Made Sally wait till she'd cooked Selby's lunch, if you please.
example.tran: 她爱搭不理地把萨莉晾在一边，直到她为塞尔比做好午饭，你说怪不怪。

entry.tran: （无礼地表示不在意或不关心）请便，随你的便
entry.def: You say 'please yourself ' to indicate in a rather rude way that you do not mind or care whether the person you are talking to does a particular thing or not.

example.ex: 'Do you mind if I wait?' I asked. Melanie shrugged: 'Please yourself.'
example.tran: 我问道：“要不我等会儿吧？”梅拉妮耸耸肩说：“随你便。”

means.word_mean: 1. give pleasure to or be pleasing to;
2. be the will of or have the will (to);

sentences.sentence: "he could do many things if he pleased"
"The waiters around her aim to please"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人愉快的, 舒适的
stems_affixes.word_buile: pleas愉快,高兴+ant表形容词→adj.令人愉快的, 舒适的
pleas愉快,高兴+e→满足的,高兴的
pleas愉快,高兴+ed表形容词→adj.高兴的, 满足的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 愉快, 快乐, 乐事
stems_affixes.word_buile: pleas愉快,高兴+ure表名词→n.愉快, 快乐, 乐事
dis不+please[adj.满足的,高兴的 v.请]→v.使不快, 使[人]生气
pleas愉快,高兴+e→满足的,高兴的

Sentence.sentence: Fine, please tell her I'll be there at 4:00.
Tom, would you please watch my suitcase for a minute?
Could you please tell me about your special skills and interests
Could I have your driving license please?
You can pretend that you don't like things which you are actually quite pleased about.
Would you please tell me where I can get batteries for this brand of camera?

sentences.en: The aim of poetry is to please.
sentences.cn: 诗的目的在于使人愉悦。

sentences.en: It pleases me that he should want to talk with me.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴他想同我谈谈。

sentences.en: Will you please to come at once?

jushi.english: Please,I don't understand what I have to do!
jushi.chinese: 真是的,我不明白该做什么好!
